select
from broker_operate_rank where 1=1 order by id desc limit #{page},10

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

avg_profit_total_rank = #{avgProfitTotalRank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select DISTINCT(name) name FROM broker_operate_rank left join company_schema on (broker_operate_rank.name = company_schema.`short_name` or broker_operate_rank.name = company_schema.`full_name` ) where 1=1
and (company_schema.`full_name`= #{brokerName} or company_schema.`short_name` = #{brokerName} or broker_operate_rank.name = #{brokerName})

select DISTINCT(broker_operate_rank.id) id FROM broker_operate_rank left join company_schema on (broker_operate_rank.name = company_schema.`short_name` or broker_operate_rank.name = company_schema.`full_name`) where 1=1 AND (company_schema.`full_name`= '${_parameter}' OR company_schema.`short_name` = '${_parameter}' OR broker_operate_rank.name = '${_parameter}' )
